dcterms:creator: P.H. Lin
C. Liao
dcterms:description: The DRB-ML dataset contains 658 C/C++ OpenMP kernels derived from DataRaceBench, extended to include labels indicating if a kernel is parallelizable or not.
dcterms:title: DRB-ML

dcterms:creator: L. Chen
Q.I. Mahmud
H. Phan
N.K. Ahmed
A. Jannesari
dcterms:description: OMP4Par is an open-source benchmark composed of data from GitHub, NAS Parallel Benchmarks, and Rodinia, containing loops with labels indicating whether a loop is parallel and the corresponding OpenMP directive.
dcterms:title: OMP4Par

dcterms:description: OMPQA is a newly created dataset for OpenMP question answering, including request-response pairs that probe the capabilities of language models in single-turn interactions.
dcterms:title: OMPQA

dcterms:creator: L. Mou
G. Li
L. Zhang
T. Wang
Z. Jin
dcterms:description: POJ-104 is derived from a pedagogical programming open judge system that evaluates the validity of submitted source code for specific problems by executing the code, useful for code similarity tasks.
dcterms:title: POJ-104
